com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events

Class SsmPackagesAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.AbstractDatabaseAction
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.SsmPackagesAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SsmInstallPackagesAction, SsmRemovePackagesAction, SsmUpgradePackagesAction

    public abstract class SsmPackagesAction
extends AbstractDatabaseAction
    Base functionality for responding to SSM package install/update/remove. Handles ordering if a remote-cmd has been specified. Subclasses are responsible for describing the affected servers, and the actual work of scheduling action(s)
